PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: Receive FM and DAB/DAB+ radio using RTL-SDR USB tuners
ENABLE_FM_DOC: Toggle to show FM radio settings
SCAN_FM_DOC: Scan for available FM radio stations
ENABLE_DAB_DOC: Toggle to show DAB and DAB+ radio settings
SCAN_DAB_DOC: Scan for available DAB/DAB+ stations (may take 2-3 minutes)
SCAN_SENSITIVITY_DOC: How sensitive the FM scanner should be when detecting stations. Higher values find only the strongest signals, lower values find more stations but may include noise.
SENSITIVITY_CONSERVATIVE: Conservative (+15 dB) - Very strong signals only
SENSITIVITY_VERY_SENSITIVE: Very Sensitive (+3 dB) - Weaker signals, may include noise
SHOW_WEB_MANAGEMENT_DOC: Toggle to show station manager access options
OPEN_CURRENT_WINDOW_DOC: Opens station manager in iframe within Volumio
OPEN_NEW_TAB_DOC: Opens station manager in new browser tab
SHOW_MANAGEMENT_CONFIG_DOC: Toggle to show advanced manager configuration
ENABLE_MENU_ITEM_DOC: Adds RTL-SDR Manager to Settings menu (requires restart)
HOSTNAME_OVERRIDE_DOC: Leave blank to use MDNS hostname. Enter your IP address (e.g. 192.168.30.208) if MDNS is unavailable
SHOW_DIAGNOSTICS_DOC: Toggle to show manual testing tools for different USB dongles
DIAGNOSTICS_PURPOSE: These tools test if your USB dongle can receive specific frequencies. Use this when: stations won't play, signal is weak, or testing a new dongle. Enter a known strong station, save settings, click test - you should hear audio. If no audio or distorted, adjust gain: lower if crackling (NESDR Smart: try 20), higher if silent (basic RTL-SDR: try 80). Test confirms your dongle works before scanning for all stations.
DIAGNOSTICS_SAVE_EXPLANATION: Save test values for next time.
MANUAL_FM_FREQUENCY_DOC: FM frequency in MHz (88.0-108.0). Example: 94.9 for BBC Radio London, 95.8 for Capital FM. Use a strong local station for testing.
TEST_FM_SAVE_REQUIRED: Required: Test uses saved values. Save settings first to test current frequency.
MANUAL_DAB_ENSEMBLE_DOC: Ensemble ID that broadcasts the service (e.g., 12B for BBC Radio1 in UK). Use DAB scan to discover ensembles in your location.
MANUAL_DAB_SERVICE_DOC: Exact service name as broadcast (e.g., BBC Radio1 not BBC Radio 1). This is the technical identifier from the ensemble, which may differ from the station's display name.
MANUAL_DAB_GAIN_DOC: RTL-SDR RF amplifier gain (0-100). Affects signal-to-noise ratio and overload threshold, not volume. NESDR Smart dongles have better amplifiers: start at 20. Generic RTL-SDR needs higher gain: start at 80. Adjust if distorted (lower) or no signal (higher).
TEST_DAB_SAVE_REQUIRED: Required: Test uses saved values. Save settings first to test current station.
TOAST_OPERATION_QUEUED_MSG: Operation will start when device becomes available (60s timeout)
TOAST_RESTART_REQUIRED: Settings saved. Please restart Volumio for changes to take effect.
TOAST_DELETED_STATION: Cannot play deleted station. Restore it first from Settings.
TOAST_CLEARED_FM: Moved {0} FM stations to recycle bin
TOAST_CLEARED_DAB: Moved {0} DAB stations to recycle bin
CONFIRM_CLEAR_FM_MSG: Move all {0} FM stations to recycle bin? You can restore them later or permanently delete them.
CONFIRM_CLEAR_DAB_MSG: Move all {0} DAB stations to recycle bin? You can restore them later or permanently delete them.
CONFIRM_RESCAN_FM: Rescan for FM stations? This will take 10-30 seconds. New stations will be added and existing favorites/customizations will be preserved.
CONFIRM_RESCAN_DAB: Rescan for DAB stations? This will take 2-5 minutes. New stations will be added and existing favorites/customizations will be preserved.
CONFIRM_EMPTY_RECYCLE_MSG: Permanently delete {0} station(s)? This cannot be undone.
CONFIRM_DELETE_ONE: Move this station to recycle bin?
CONFIRM_PURGE_ONE: Permanently delete this station? This cannot be undone.
WARN_FREQ_CHANGE_MSG: You are about to change the frequency for "{0}"
WARN_FREQ_CHANGE_DETAILS: This will affect playback. Make sure the new frequency is correct. Only proceed if you know this station broadcasts on {0} MHz.
WARN_FREQ_DUPLICATE: Warning: {0} MHz already exists in your station list
WARN_FREQ_INVALID: Invalid frequency. Must be between 87.5 and 108.0 MHz
RECYCLE_NOTICE: Deleted stations are kept here until purged. You can restore them or permanently delete them.
BROWSE_NO_FAVORITES_DESC: Add stations to favorites from FM or DAB lists
BROWSE_NO_RECENT_DESC: Play some stations to see them here
BROWSE_NO_FM_DESC: Click Rescan to search for stations
BROWSE_EDIT_INFO: To edit stations: Settings > Plugins > FM/DAB Radio
BROWSE_NO_DAB_DESC: Click Rescan to search for stations
BROWSE_PURGE_ALL_DESC: Remove all deleted stations from database
